name: places/ChIJG0yHcllYwokR86U_Lm2XfTg
formattedAddress: 440 W 57th St, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 440 W 57th St, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: I should have believed the bad reviews about this place. I got my car back with big scratches on the side! When I told the guy who brought my car back about it, he said ‘come back tomorrow to show the car to the manager’. I won’t be coming back since I don’t go there every day and had to leave with a damaged car. Don’t park your car here!!

originalText.text: Stay away from this garage, trust me. They are destroying my car. Every time I take it out, it's COVERED in dust, debris, sometimes soda, and then I noticed the scratches. Dealing with ICON has also been a bit nightmarish. The manager there, Santos, is one of the most unprofessional "managers" i've ever dealt with----he initially refused to help me file an insurance claim through ICON corporate until I finally was able to get them involved. Stay away from this lot and stay away from ICON lots in general. Trust me.

originalText.text: Why is the monthly rate so cheap when compared to other ICON spots? I know why... AVOID this place if you value and care about your car. They got my car into an accident and initially took NO responsability. I got a loaner vehicle while the car was being fixed (eventually Icon did took responsibility) and guess what!? They screwed that one too! The worst part is that they tried to hide the loaner damage but it was macroscopically visible. Don't be fooled by the fake "friendliness" of the personnel, your car will suffer... and you will regret your decision.

originalText.text: A man named Wilson demanded cash payment to retrieve my car or allow me to access something inside my car. He threatened that I would have to pay $103.00 for the additional 12 hours I left the car in the garage. Very sad that he was confident that the Icon owners wouldn't have a problem with his conduct.

text.text: A man named Wilson demanded cash payment to retrieve my car or allow me to access something inside my car. He threatened that I would have to pay $103.00 for the additional 12 hours I left the car in the garage. Very sad that he was confident that the Icon owners wouldn't have a problem with his conduct.

originalText.text: The staff was extremely friendly!  We couldn't check in so they allowed us to come back to get our belongings so we didn't have to carry them around NYC for hours.  Sincerely appreciated it.  They were extremely busy and didn't mind helping us when we came to get our things.  Our car looked just as good as when we left it there! Thank you staff!!!! I wish we would have got your names to thank you personally! :)
